AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !AKDsMoreRelics:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
AKDsMoreRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !AKDsMoreRelics:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
